segments.text: I see the water pouring over the edge of the sink, and it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate, like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is getting bigger, and soon the whole floor will be wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t noticed yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, and she’s completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that wobbly stool, and it looks like it could tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, completely innocent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like it’s about to go wrong at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should say something, but I’m not sure if I should.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a tense situation to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
